sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2014/L.6), the SBI takes note of parties' views, and agrees to continue its consideration of this matter at SBI 44 on the basis of the draft treaty arrangements on the issue.
Privileges and Immunities for Individuals Serving on Constituted Bodies Established under the Convention: This item was first considered by the SBI on 4 June.
Informal consultations were facilitated by Kunihiko Shimada.
